languages.text: {n}Окинув вас испытующим взглядом, священник сухо произносит:{/n} "Посмотрим, как долго она продолжится под нападками населяющих этот сектор грешников, которым противно все святое и чистое".

traits.locale_text: {n}Окинув вас испытующим взглядом, священник сухо произносит:{/n} "Посмотрим, как долго она продолжится под нападками населяющих этот сектор грешников, которым противно все святое и чистое".

languages.text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the profaners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."
languages.original_text: {n}Окинув вас испытующим взглядом, священник сухо произносит:{/n} "Посмотрим, как долго она продолжится под нападками населяющих этот сектор грешников, которым противно все святое и чистое".

traits.locale_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinizing look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the sinners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."
{n}He gives you a scrutinizing look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the sinners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."
{n}He gives you a scrutinizing look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the sinners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."
{n}He gives you a scrutinizing look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the sinners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."

{n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the profaners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."

languages.text: {n}他审慎地看着你，之后干巴巴地说道。{/n}“那我们来看看，你的信仰在这片星域的罪人之中能维持多久吧，他们厌弃一切神圣、纯洁的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the profaners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."

traits.locale_text: {n}他审慎地看着你，之后干巴巴地说道。{/n}“那我们来看看，你的信仰在这片星域的罪人之中能维持多久吧，他们厌弃一切神圣、纯洁的东西。”

languages.text: {n}Te lanza una mirada inquisidora antes de proclamar con sequedad:{/n} «Veremos cuánto dura ante la arremetida de los profanos que habitan en este sector y que aborrecen todo lo sagrado y puro».
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the profaners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te lanza una mirada inquisidora antes de proclamar con sequedad:{/n} «Veremos cuánto dura ante la arremetida de los pecadores que habitan en este sector y que aborrecen todo lo sagrado y puro».

languages.text: {n}彼はこちらを精査するような目で見た後、乾いた口調で言った。{/n}「この星域に生息する神聖で純粋なものすべてに反感を抱く冒涜者たちの猛攻撃を受けながら、いつまでその信仰心を保てるか見ものです」
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the profaners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はこちらを精査するような目で見た後、乾いた口調で言った。{/n}「この星域に生息する神聖で純粋なものすべてに反感を抱く罪人たちの猛攻撃を受けながら、いつまでその信仰心を保てるか見ものです」

languages.text: {n}Er wirft dir einen prüfenden Blick zu und meint dann trocken:{/n} "Wir werden sehen, wie lange Ihr unter dem Ansturm der Sünder bestehen könnt, die diesen Sektor bewohnen und von allem angewidert sind, das heilig und rein ist."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the profaners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er wirft dir einen prüfenden Blick zu und meint dann trocken:{/n} "Wir werden sehen, wie lange Ihr unter dem Ansturm der Sünder bestehen könnt, die diesen Sektor bewohnen und von allem angewidert sind, das heilig und rein ist."

languages.text: {n}Il vous dévisage un moment, avant de reprendre sèchement :{/n} « Nous verrons combien de temps vous tiendrez face à l'afflux des profanateurs qui hantent ce secteur et rejettent tout ce qui est pur et sacré. »
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the profaners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous dévisage un moment, avant de reprendre sèchement :{/n} « Nous verrons combien de temps vous tiendrez face à l'afflux des pécheurs qui hantent ce secteur et rejettent tout ce qui est pur et sacré. »

languages.text: {n}Sana irdeleyici bir bakış atıyor, ardından ses tonu ruhsuzlaşıyor.{/n} "Bakalım bu sektörün kutsal ve saf olan her şeyin karşısında duran günahkâr sakinlerinin saldırıları altındayken imanına ne kadar tutunabileceksin."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a scrutinising look, then says dryly,{/n} "We'll see how long it lasts under the onslaught of the profaners who inhabit this sector and who are repulsed by all things sacred and pure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana irdeleyici bir bakış atıyor, ardından ses tonu ruhsuzlaşıyor:{/n} "Bakalım bu sektörde yaşayan, kutsal ve saf olan her şeyin karşısında duran günahkârların saldırıları altındayken buna ne kadar süre devam edebileceksin."
